184
185
186 template <typename AttributeType>
187 boost::optional<AttributeType> Device::parse_configuration_query_result(
188 HResult result,
189 AttributeType attribute_value
190 ) const {
191 switch (result) {
192 case HResult::Ok:
193 return attribute_value;
194
195 case HResult::NotImplemented:
196 return { };
197
198 case HResult::InvalidArg :
199 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
200 << decklink_error_code(result)
201 << errmsg("The option exists but was queried with the wrong type, e.g. queried an Int attribute with `get_attribute_flag`")
202 );
203
204 case HResult::Fail:
205 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
206 << decklink_error_code(result)
207 << errmsg("The query failed for an unknown reason")
208 );
209
210 default:
211 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
212 << decklink_error_code(result)
213 << errmsg("An unknown error occurred")
214 );
215 }
216 }
217
